ci-forms-submit: Label for the button that activates the action of form submission
ci-forms-email-subject:
Subject of the email sent by the extension. Parameters:
* $1 - a form name
* $2 - the page name
ci-forms-dispatch-error:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - Email of sender
ci-forms-dispatch-success: Success message shown on Special:CIFormsSubmit after dispatching form
ci-forms-recaptcha-error:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - An error code
* $2 - Email to which message should be sent in case of need to contact
ci-forms-recaptcha-negative-score:
An error message. Parameters:
* $1 - Email to which message should be sent in case of need to contact
